cause.description:
Anokijig is a camp located in Plymouth, WI. It offers a variety of programs for youth summer camping as well as adult and family camping.
1. Caring, Honesty, Responsibility, Respect
2. Every child deserves a safe, supportive environment to grow
3. Outdoor education makes stronger children and families
cause.mission: Preserve the Legacy of Anokijig for Future Generations
cause.name: Save Anokijig
